sentences.sContent: The company said it would pay in full all its creditors except Credit Suisse.
sentences.sCn: 该公司说将全额付款给除瑞士信贷以外的所有债权人。

remMethod.val: credit(信贷) + or(表人) → 贷方， 债权人

words.tran: 信用，信誉；[金融] 贷款；学分；信任；声望
相信，信任；把…归给，归功于；赞颂

trans.tranOther: a person, bank, or company that you owe money to
